reviews.text:
Location is good although not really city centre, tram outside and a bus just around the corner will take you where you need to go. When we checked in our room it was dirty. Pastry still on the table sticky drink marks, bedside tables not cleaned, bathroom sink had hair in amongst the dust that had gathered (in this just been cleaned room) after going back to reception the manager who I must add was very attentive, and moved us to an upgraded executive room straight away. When we arrived at the new room, it was very nicely decorated - had a huge balcony that over looked the city, overall very spacious. We went on about our day. Once returning to the hotel I ran a bath and unpacked. The bed side tables again dirty. Table in the room dust all over the floor, walked into the bathroom and you could see the dust on top of my bath water, it had to be emptied and re ran. Not really a pleasant stay.
For a 4 star hotel you expect better. Would we stay here again? No. Would we recommend? No.

(Photos of this are from the upgraded room)

Lots of good things to say about this hotel but the mold on the shower walls was pretty gross and not reflective of a 4-star hotel - hence my overall mid-rating! Otherwise the room was great - we had booked a triple (1 twin, 1 king bed) and it was very spacious. The service in the bar was great and the food & cocktails were great (only ate there once). The location is brilliant for a lot of things in the city as well being only a short trip to the airport. The proximity to 3arena is great if you are attending a show - but kind of annoying if youâ€™re not as the place is overrun with concert goers ðŸ˜… Overall I will likely stay again but really think they need to clean up the shower. Itâ€™s not hard!!

Awesome stay!
I recently stayed here for my first time in Dublin. Itâ€™s overall a great hotel.
It is not in the center of the city, but right outside the entrance doors is the tram which is so convenient. Itâ€™s about an 8 minute tram ride into the center and itâ€™s so easy to navigate.
The staff was awesome, they were very helpful when we had questions about getting around town.
The rooms here updated, clean, and had AC which was a big plus. It was a very pleasant stay and would definitely recommend this place for anyone looking for a quiet, comfortable hotel.

Would recommend

Good:
Bar was nice and spacious, nice range of drinks
Great location and security too
Room spacious and good facilities
Rooms were nice and quite
Special packages were good as well

Bad:
Under bed was very dusty
Alot of the grout in shower was orange
Scrambled egg and breakfast was unpleasant
No glasses at breakfast so asked manager for them,  girl who brought them down had a face of stone and completely mute.  Disappointing considering all other staff were pleasant.
Complimentary water in the room would be appreciated as most 4 star we stay in offer 2 bottles on arrival.

We had a lovely stay in the Gibson during the week. I could not speak highly enough of how friendly and helpful each member of staff were. The room and hotel breakfast room service was certainly a highlight! And the amenities such as the relaxation area were absolutely exceptional. We will most definitely be back!
